results.title: What is Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)? - Azure Kubernetes Service
results.description: What is Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS). Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) is a managed Kubernetes service that you can use to deploy and manage containerized applications.  ...for deploying and managing containerized applications that require high availability, scalability, and portability, and for deploying applications to multiple regions, using.

results.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) documentation
results.description: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) AKS allows you to quickly deploy a production ready Kubernetes cluster in Azure. Supported Kubernetes versions Concept Core concepts Reference Azure CLI Azure PowerShell REST Get started Quickstart Create a Linux cluster Create a Windows cluster Tutorial Prepare an application for AKS Training AKS training modules.
